message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $14000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $14000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
I understand you're looking to make a profit, but $13000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll offer $11500. Can you consider that?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, but I still need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $12500.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I still think $12500 is a bit high. I'll make one more offer: $11800. Can you meet me at this price?
